name: The Final Decision
description: Hi! We are a group of students doing a game for Ludum Dare.  The game is a mix of drama and comedy. You are an old man who die sleeping on his bed.  Then, he comes into a strange dream were the death force him to pass trought seven situations, the seven deadly sins. Then he will know if he deserve heaven or hell. His destiny its on your hands. Let´s go and play to see how funny the seven proofs are, but most important, have a good time ;)
